name: Garbage Truck Challenge
description:
Get ready for our new off road journey game.Here in this game you will be tested and we tend to challenge your driving skills and check them to the easy lay with this Off road Race. Your aim in this game is to drive garbage truck and race against your opponents.
Good luck and rejoice.
Features:
* Beautiful Stunning 3 Dimensional Graphics
* Smooth And Easy Game Play
* Environments That Keeps Changing
* Real Life Animations And Physics
